ovdesc.p: Capture the safe deposit box inventory details

desc.p: This field is used to provide the description
Safe deposit Box details
This field is used to provide the alternate id
for the safe deposit box type
This field can be used for migration purpose
This field is used to provide the Mnemonic
for the safe deposit box type
This field is used to store the Customer
key number for the Safe deposit Box
This field is used to specify the Customer
key status for the Safe Deposit Box
This field is used to store the Bank
key number for each Safe Deposit Box
This field is used to store the Status of the
Bank key for each Safe Deposit Box
The value to this field will be defaulted from
the status defined in the table SDB.PARAMETER
desc.P: The user is allowed to change the status

desc.p: This field is used to give any additional information
related to Box type
This field is used to specify the location
of the safe deposit box
This field gets updated once the safe deposited box
is Blocked or Rented
